attributes.action: Block the extradition of Julian Assange.
attributes.background:
Julian Assange is the founder of WikiLeaks. One of the most well known hubs for freedom of speech and exposing corruption and illegal activities all the way up to top tier government level.

Following his arrest he is to be prosecuted in the US and it is in our interest to block this

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

You can read more about the case here:
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/world-affairs/europe/extradition-from-the-uk-what-next-for-julian-assange/
